Class InstalledPluginFolderParser

    See Also:

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      voidaddDependencies(ArrayList installedPluginList!)
      ListgetInstalledPlugins(File directory!)
      voidsetHasConfigurationProgram(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

      Parses the given installed plugin's home directory for a plugin configuration program located in a cfg/ folder. If the plugin has such a program its "hasConfigurationProgram" will be set to true.

      voidsetHasDemo(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

      • getInstalledPlugins

      • setHasConfigurationProgram

        public void setHasConfigurationProgram(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)

        Parses the given installed plugin's home directory for a plugin configuration program located in a cfg/ folder. If the plugin has such a program its "hasConfigurationProgram" will be set to true.

        Parameters:
        installedPlugin! The plugin whose home directory will be searched.

      • setHasDemo

        public void setHasDemo(InstalledBBjPlugin installedPlugin!)
